the Library of Virginia 34372

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Gates Family Bible Record, 1784-1895. Accession 34372, Bible records collection, The Library of Virginia, Richmond, Virginia.

acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: Gift of William B. Gates, Jr., Colonial Heights, Virginia, 8 February 1993.

bioghist.head: Biographical/Historical Information
bioghist.p: The Gates family lived in Chesterfield County, Virginia.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Information
scopecontent.p: Bible of William Beverly Gates, "Yellow House," Harrowgate Road, Chesterfield, Virginia.

Includes Bible record (4 leaves), transcript (4 leaves), slave births (1 leaf), notes (3 leaves). Area covered is Chesterfield County, Virginia. Bible printed in 1822. Other surnames mentioned: Belcher, Bruce, and Woodson.
The April 1984 issue (minus pp. 3 and 4) of The Messenger of the Chesterfield Historical Society of Virginia, containing a transcript of the Bible is included.
